column5: I found this site to be very helpfull.....  http://rapidfire.sci.gsfc.nasa.gov/subsets...ua.721.250m.jpg   Jason

this site is better they take about 6 photos a day and shows snow cover  http://coastwatch.glerl.noaa.gov/modis/region_map.html  click on lake ontario and you will see central ontario etc..  with each lake clicked on
Its the same thing, just the other one the ice shows up better for me.
